```{r}
# Load required packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
```


```{r}
# Read in data

# 1985/01/01 - 1994/01/01
weather_1985_1994 <- read_csv(here('data/85-94.csv')) %>% # Read in csv
  janitor::clean_names() %>% # convert column names to lower snake case
  select(station, date, hourly_precipitation) %>% # select only columns we are interested in
  filter(!is.na(hourly_precipitation)) # drop any na's in the precipitation column

# 1994/01/02 - 2003/12/31
weather_1994_2003 <- read_csv(here('data/94-03.csv')) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(station, date, hourly_precipitation) %>%
  filter(!is.na(hourly_precipitation))

# 2004/01/01 - 2013/12/31
weather_2004_2014 <- read_csv(here('data/04-14.csv')) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(station, date, hourly_precipitation) %>%
  filter(!is.na(hourly_precipitation))

# 2014/01/01 - 2023/12/31
weather_2014_2023 <- read_csv(here('data/14-23.csv')) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(station, date, hourly_precipitation) %>%
  filter(!is.na(hourly_precipitation))
```

```{r}
typeof(weather_1985_1994$date)
```

```{r}
# First preliminary plot of 85 to 94 data
ggplot(weather_1985_1994, aes(date, hourly_precipitation)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
# Aggregate data to get daily precipitation
daily_avg_1985_1994 <- weather_1985_1994 %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarize(daily_avg_precip = mean(hourly_precipitation))
```

```{r}
ggplot(daily_avg_1985_1994, aes(date, daily_avg_precip)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
# Calculate daily average precipitation for each dataset
daily_avg_1985_1994 <- weather_1985_1994 %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarize(daily_avg_precip = mean(hourly_precipitation)) %>%
  mutate(period = "1985-1994")

daily_avg_1994_2003 <- weather_1994_2003 %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarize(daily_avg_precip = mean(hourly_precipitation)) %>%
  mutate(period = "1994-2003")

daily_avg_2004_2014 <- weather_2004_2014 %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarize(daily_avg_precip = mean(hourly_precipitation)) %>%
  mutate(period = "2004-2014")

daily_avg_2014_2023 <- weather_2014_2023 %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarize(daily_avg_precip = mean(hourly_precipitation)) %>%
  mutate(period = "2014-2023")

# Combine all datasets into one
combined_data <- bind_rows(daily_avg_1985_1994, daily_avg_1994_2003, daily_avg_2004_2014, daily_avg_2014_2023)

# Plot the combined data
ggplot(combined_data, aes(x = date, y = daily_avg_precip, color = period)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    title = "Daily Average Precipitation by Period",
    x = "Date",
    y = "Daily Average Precipitation (mm)",
    color = "Period"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
